version_description:
- Receive notifications when you meet your fast goal
- Change your fast start time before you stop fasting
- Other bug fixes

Hello fellow fasters, lots of new features in this 2.0 release!

- Edit current and previous fast times
- Support for 24hr+ fasts
- Scrolling performance improvements
- Start and goal times now visible while fasting
- Fasting progress bar
- Now tracks nighttime for fasts started after midnight
- Now tracking per fast instead of per week
Fixed a few minor bugs.
Improved support for iOS 11 and iPhone X.

- Start fast reminder: You can now set a daily "start fast" reminder.
- Toggle time display: Tap the time to switch between Elapsed Time and Remaining Time.
- Misc bug fixes.

This release includes some highly requested features and bug fixes:

Introducing Zero on APPLE WATCH!
* Sync with your iPhone to initiate, manage and complete fasts all from the convenience of your Watch
* Make sure to add custom Zero complications to show your fasting progress on your favorite Watch face

ADDITIONAL ENHANCEMENTS & BUG FIXES
* All-new content in the Science section that will be continually updated to help you on your fasting journey
* Added the option to toggle the fasting timer to count up or down in Settings
* Improved sunset/sunrise accuracy when Location Services are not enabled
* Fixed issues where some content was cut off on iPhone 5/SE
* Additional enhancements and bug fixes

We fixed some bugs:

* Fixed a notification bug where notifications were incorrectly showing if you ended a fast before the goal time
* Fixed a bug where the notification time selector was cut off for some users on iOS 10

Based on popular demand, we've added a few updates and various bug fixes:

* NEW TODAY WIDGET. A super-convenient way to start, end and view active fasts on the Today screen. Many of you have been asking for this and today we're happy to bring it to you!
* We changed the behavior of fasting goals -- now when you select a new fasting goal, this selection will be reflected on the Timer screen even if an active fast is in progress
* Now when you select a custom fast goal from the Watch, that fast length will be reflected on the iPhone app's custom fast goal
* The Watch timer direction now reflects the timer direction (elapsed time or counting down) that is selected on the iPhone app
* Fixed the goal picker being cut off on Watch Series 4
* Additional bug fixes and optimizations
Fixed a bug where the Today widget timer doesn't agree with the App timer after changing start/stop times mid-fast.
Watch 4 complications are here! If you have the spiffy new Watch 4, this is the update you've been waiting for.
Fixed an issue where Watch complications were not showing up for some users after our Watch 4 update. Sorry about that!
Additional bug fixes for Watch complications not showing up for some users. Please note that Watch OS 4 and above is required to use Zero on Apple Watch.

Lots of awesome updates based on your feedback to the recently released Zero 3.0

• Faster loading times across the app
• New end of fast experience with fewer taps
• You now have one more way to delete a fast -- from the Journey screen, find the fast you want to delete, and long press on that fast. An option to delete the fast will appear
• Improved swipe navigation between your Stats and Journey screens
• You can update your account email address from the Settings screen
• Pull to refresh the Learn tab
• Privacy Policy now viewable on the Settings screen
• Even though we don't think you'll need this, you can now delete an account from the Settings screen
• Other fixes and enhancements

We've been hard at work making the Zero experience even better. This time around we:
• Added Google login
• Fixed bugs and made performance improvements

Zero’s latest update includes several great features to keep you motivated!

We’ve received hundreds of suggestions from people like you that inspired these additions. We hope you’ll love them!

Here are some ways this new version of Zero will help keep you motivated:

Badges, badges, badges!
Who doesn’t like getting a gold star? With the new badges feature, the Zero app will recognize you when you achieve fasting milestones such as hitting a certain number of fasts logged, or extending your fasting streak. We’ll be adding many more badges in the future, too!

Going green
Reaching your fast goal is a moment to celebrate! Your timer ring will now turn green when you reach your goal. We heard from many of you that it wasn’t always clear when your fast goal was met, so we wanted to make it much more obvious with this color change.

New social share graphic
Fasting is easier when you get support from others. That’s why we’ve updated the social share graphic to make it more compelling to share with your friends.

And for good measure, we've added in a few tweaks and improvements, including:

• Emails to keep you on track with your fasting, and up to date on your stats
• Logging weight with a decimal point on non-US keyboards
• Changing your fast goal directly from the timer screen
• Showing your elapsed time as the primary timer stat, even when you exceed your goal

Thank you so much to everyone in the community for suggesting great feature ideas, improvements, and pointing out annoying bugs. Everyone on the team here is so grateful for how engaged everyone is in the Zero community. Keep your feedback coming!

Hi, Zero crew! We've got some fun updates for you today:

• It's getting dark in here... Say hello to dark mode! You asked, we listened—join us on the dark side. To enable dark mode, head over to Settings.
• Improved badge sharing graphic. Share your fasting progress with friends.
• Connect with Zero on social media. You can now find all of our social channels in Settings.

As always, thanks for keeping your suggestions and feedback coming our way.
Team Zero

Hi, Zero crew! Today we’ve got a couple more features that will help you stay motivated on your fasting journey. We hope you love them:

• Thought you earned all the badges? Think again! Check out the badges card at the bottom of the History section to see which badges you might earn next.
• Working on a weight goal? Now you can set a goal from the Weight card in the History section to keep track of your progress.

We’ve also made dark mode a bit darker for even better visibility and less disruption at night.

We hope that no matter where you are in your experience with fasting, these features will help you go just a bit further.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi, Zero crew! Today’s update is all about bug fixes and small tweaks, specifically:

• If you’ve been having issues with Zero not showing up as a source for Apple Health, then this update should fix that.
• We’re now showing you some of your unearned badges on the main badges screen, which you can access from the History tab.
• We’ve also made some small updates to copy in the app so things read a little clearer.

Thank you for continuing to report bugs. Keep bringing them up and we’ll keep doing our best to squash them.

Happy fasting!

Hi, Zero crew! Today we’ve got a few fixes and improvements, including:

• Logging weight with either a decimal point or a comma
• Making it easier to see the ‘Save Changes’ button after selecting your birthdate or gender during onboarding
• Fixing an issue where the incorrect badge image was show for several badges

Thank you for your continued help finding bugs for us to squash!

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi, Zero crew!

Today’s update is a quick cleanup and reorganization of the notifications settings screen. We hope it makes managing your notification preferences a bit easier.

Thank you for your continued feedback and support!

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi, Zero crew! Just doing some quick cleanup to make sure our systems are working 100%.

Thank you for your continued feedback and support!

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi, Zero crew! We’re super excited about today’s update because it celebrates our favorite thing: all of you! From the timer screen, you can now tap on the number of people fasting to see more stats about the Zero community. Check it out!

We’ve also added a new notification setting for Zero Updates, so you’ll be in the loop on all the latest from Zero.

We’ve hit 40 million fasts and counting. Go team!

Hi, Zero crew!

Today's release is full of great features to keep you motivated, accountable, and informed.

• Sign in with Apple and support for system dark mode in iOS13.
• You can now share your fasting timer to your favorite social networks. Just start a fast, and tap the share button at the bottom right of the timer. Give it a try!
• Fasting and weigh-in reminders have been updated to give you more flexibility. Want to be reminded to start your fast at a different time each day? Not a problem after this update! You can also customize your weigh-in notifications for certain days of the week or just once per week if you don’t weigh in daily.
• Notifications when new content is added to the Learn tab mean you’ll never miss out on the latest fasting knowledge. You can update these settings by tapping the gear icon in the History tab.

Thank you for your continued feedback and support.

Happy fasting!
Team Zero

Hi, Zero crew!

Today’s release corrects an issue with fasting reminders. If you recently set a reminder, and it didn’t stick around after you completed a fast, this release contains the fix.

Speaking of reminders, you can set them once you’ve loaded a fast by tapping on the ‘Set Reminder’ button at the bottom of the timer. Give it a try!

Thank you for your continued feedback and support.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

How are you feeling?

Today’s release is all about awareness of your body during your fasts. We’re updating the Fast Journal, so you can add notes about how you’re feeling at any point during your fast, instead of waiting until the end. You’ll also be able to see how your mood changed throughout your fast on a nifty chart.

To add an entry, start a fast and tap on the smiley face emoji in the bottom left of the timer.

We hope you love it!

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

Today’s release makes it easier for you to contact our amazing support team, directly through the app.

Just head to Settings, then tap ‘Contact Support’. We’re here to help!

Thank you for your continued feedback and support.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

Today we have a couple of important bug fixes:

• If you’ve had trouble saving fasts when offline, this release should fix that.
• Received a notification when you weren’t supposed to? That will no longer be an issue with this update.

Thank you for your continued feedback and support.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

Thank you for your continued feedback about our Learn tab. We hope you find it a useful resource on your fasting journey.

Today’s update has a quick fix for a bug that prevented some people from seeing the Learn tab. Now nothing will stand in your way of learning more about fasting. :)

Thank you for your continued feedback and support.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

We hope you’re hungry… for more fasting knowledge!

Today, we’ve updated our Learn tab with a new design to make it even easier to browse our content. Each week we add great new info to help make fasting simple. Be sure to turn on the ‘New Learn content’ notification in settings to be notified when new articles, videos, and studies are available.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

In 2019, the Zero community logged over 40 million fasts—what a year!

Speaking of stats, this release has some big updates to our History tab. There are new stats, a new design, and you can now log your weight without having to connect to any 3rd party apps. Woo hoo!

Update today to get all the new, shiny stats and to participate in our January campaign.

Looking forward to an awesome 2020 with you.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

Today’s release helps fix some bugs related to our new stats update. Sorry about those!

The following bugs should be fixed:

• Some 2019 logs mistakenly recorded as 2020
• Issues entering weight with a past date
• Sleep chart now only shows 'Asleep' data from Health

We apologize for any inconvenience, and please keep us posted if you experience any other issues.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

You know how delicious that first bite of food tastes when you’re breaking a fast? Let’s celebrate that moment!

Today we’re introducing a new way for you to capture your fast breaker meal. Just end a fast, tap the “Share Your Fast Breaker” button on the post-fast screen, and snap a photo of the food you’re breaking your fast with and share or save the photo.

Looking forward to seeing all your tasty fast breakers!

Happy fasting (and feeding),
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

It’s not spring yet, but we’re doing some cleanup here at Zero. Today’s release features a few fixes related to the new stats we recently launched.

Speaking of stats, we’re about to hit 1 billion hours fasted! Keep an eye on the ‘Who’s fasting?’ page in the app to see us hit this huge milestone together.

Thank you for your continued help finding bugs for us to squash.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

Today’s release includes fixes related to the enhanced stats we recently launched.

Thank you for your continued help finding bugs for us to squash.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

Today’s update includes some code cleanup and bug fixes.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

With this update, fasting charts in History have been updated so that the date now reflects the date you ended and saved your fast.

You can also now find links to the other Big Sky Health apps in Settings. Check out Less—a tool for more mindful drinking—and Oak—our meditation and breathing app.

Wishing you well,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew - This is the biggest update in Zero history—with Zero 4.0, we’re launching Zero Plus: Your Personal Fasting Coach. After you update, head over to Learn for a video walkthrough of all the incredible new features. The Zero you know and love remains free, with some upgrades including a brand new Timer.

Try a 7-day free trial of Zero Plus to get access to new, premium features including an advanced Timer with Fasting Zones that keep you motivated to reach metabolic milestones, exclusive content from fasting experts like Dr. Peter Attia, advanced Statistics that correlate fasting data with weight, resting heart rate, and sleep, custom Fast Presets, and a responsive Fast Journal with in-the-moment motivation to keep you on track.

Fast forward to better health with Zero Plus: Your Personal Fasting Coach. We can’t wait for you to try it out.

Wishing you well,
Team Zero

Hi Fast Friends,

It's now easier than ever to start and stop your fast with iOS 14 widgets and "Hey Siri" support!

Enjoy these great new features, and thanks for supporting Zero.

Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

Today’s update brings extra support and guidance to Zero Plus subscribers.

During your fast, you’ll now receive tips on the Coach dashboard, to help you reach your goals. Start a Coach plan and the tips will begin to appear as you reach different milestones during your fast.

Thank you so much for your feedback, which shaped this new feature. We hope you love it.

Wishing you well,

Hi Zero crew,

Today’s update includes new Coach features to support you during your fasts. You’ll now be notified when new tips are available on your Coach dashboard, and you can share these tips with friends. Make sure to enable notifications in your Zero settings so that you never miss these Coach updates.

As always, let us know what you think of these new features!


Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Introducing Challenges, a new way to stay motivated on the fast track. Participate in Challenges that support your health goals, and unlock exclusive Achievements. With Challenges you’re not alone—invite friends, and receive encouragement and tips from our experts along the way.

In addition to Challenges, this update brings you an all-new layout. Check out the Explore tab to find your favorite Learn content and all available Challenges. The Me tab gives you a full summary of your history with Zero (including a new home for all of your Achievements).

Today’s release includes a brand new version of the Zero Coach! With this update, you can now create an entirely custom plan and schedule your fasts ahead of time. If you're already using Coach, head to your Dashboard and tap the pencil icon next to your current plan, or the 'Edit Plan' button at the very bottom of the screen.

This release also includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you for your continued support!

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

Hi Zero crew,

In today's release, we're introducing the Eating Window: a brand new feature to help you track and improve your nutrition. This new feature includes:

- Simple meal logging
- Optional macronutrient tracking
- A new timer to track the time between your fasts, and countdown to your next one
- A new calendar to view your nutrition progress
- An updated widget and new reminders
- New sharing options for your meal photos
- Updated scheduling features

We hope you enjoy these new Zero Plus features! Please send your feedback to support@zerofasting.com

Happy fasting,
Team Zero

In today's release, we added ketone logging. We also addressed some reported issues related to editing and deleting past data on the Me tab.

Happy fasting,
Team Zero
